A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a lifelong Star Wars fan\, I have never been so disappointed. Though the actors tried their best to give something to their fans\, especially from Mark Hamill\, It suffers from bad writing and directing from Rian Johnson. Who appears to ignore what the fans want. Disney\, if you want to continue making these movies\, I'm all for it\, but you better rethink your approach. You owe it to the fans\, Hamill\, Lucas and Fisher\, god bless her soul.
